uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

port_disable_timer_in_seconds.description: Set the number of seconds before disabled ports are automatically re-enabled.

transmit_interval_in_seconds.description: Set the number of seconds between loop detect packet transmissions.

is_trap_on_loop_detected_enabled.description: Enable to generate a trap when a loop is detected.
